<DESCRIPTION>SHARING AGREEMENT, DATED AS OF JANUARY 11, 2006
<TEXT>
<HTML><HEAD>
<TITLE>Sharing Agreement, dated as of January 11, 2006</TITLE>
</HEAD>
 <BODY BGCOLOR="WHITE">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Exhibit 4.1(iii) </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>SHARING AGREEMENT </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>THIS SHARING AGREEMENT,</B> dated as of January&nbsp;11, 2006, is among (i)&nbsp;Bank of America, N.A., as agent for the Lenders (as defined below)
under the Credit Agreement referred to below, (ii)&nbsp;the holders of the 1999 Notes issued pursuant to the 1999 Note Agreement (as defined below) listed on the signature pages hereof (together with their respective successors and assigns, the
&#147;<B>1999 Noteholders</B>&#148;), (iii)&nbsp;the holders of the 2000 Notes issued pursuant to the 2000 Note Agreement (as defined below) listed on the signature pages hereof (together with their respective successors and assigns, the
&#147;<B>2000 Noteholders</B>&#148;) and (iv)&nbsp;the holders from time to time (together with their respective successors and assigns, the <B>&#147;Parity Debtholders&#148;</B>) of an Additional Obligor&#146;s (as defined below) indebtedness under
one or more credit, loan or note agreements, indentures or other financing instruments with an Additional Obligor and such Parity Debtholders (or a trustee or agent or similar Person acting for such Parity Debtholders) (as such agreements,
indentures or instruments shall from time to time be amended and in effect being herein called the &#147;<B>Parity Debt Agreements</B>&#148;), which Parity Debtholders shall have become parties hereto in the manner provided in Section&nbsp;5.4
hereof. Capitalized terms not otherwise defined herein shall have the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;2.1 hereof. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>1.</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>PRELIMINARY STATEMENT </B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>1.1.</I></B> The 1999 Noteholders have each entered into a Note Agreement, dated as of November&nbsp;12, 1999, with 3031786 Nova Scotia Company
(&#147;<B>3031786</B>&#148;) as amended by (i)&nbsp;that certain Amendment No.&nbsp;1 dated as of February&nbsp;5, 2003 pursuant to which the 1999 Noteholders purchased from 3031786 7.66% Senior Notes due November&nbsp;12, 2007, in the aggregate
principal amount of its U.S.$24,500,000 (the &#147;<B>7.66% Notes</B>&#148;) and its 7.80% Senior Notes due November&nbsp;12, 2010, in the aggregate principal amount of U.S.$45,500,000 (the &#147;<B>7.80% Notes</B>&#148; and together with the 7.66%
Notes, collectively, the &#147;<B>1999 Notes</B>&#148;), (ii)&nbsp;that certain Assumption and Amendment Agreement, dated as of August&nbsp;26, 2005, whereby Barnes Group Inc. (the &#147;<B>Company</B>&#148;) assumed the obligations of 30301786
under said Note Agreement and the 1999 Notes, and (iii)&nbsp;that certain Amendment No.&nbsp;3 dated as of the date hereof among the 1999 Noteholders and the Company (said Note Agreement, as so amended, and as it may hereafter be amended, modified,
supplemented or restated from time to time, the &#147;<B>1999 Note Agreement</B>&#148;); </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>1.2.</I></B> The Lenders and the Agent have entered into the Second Amended and Restated Revolving Credit Agreement, dated as of January&nbsp;11, 2006 (and as it may hereafter be amended, restated, modified or
otherwise supplemented from time to time, the &#147;<B>Credit Agreement</B>&#148;), with the Company and Barnes Group Switzerland GmbH (&#147;<B>Barnes Switzerland</B>&#148;, together with the Company and each Additional Obligor, collectively, the
&#147;<B>Obligors</B>&#148;), and other parties thereto pursuant to which the Lenders are making and providing, and may continue to make and provide, revolving loans and other financial accommodations to the Obligors; </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>1.3.</I></B> The 2000 Noteholders have each entered into a Note
Agreement, dated as of November&nbsp;21, 2000 (as amended by Amendment No.&nbsp;1 dated February&nbsp;21, 2002, Amendment No.&nbsp;2 dated as of February&nbsp;5, 2003 and Amendment No.&nbsp;3 dated the date hereof, and as it may be amended,
modified, supplemented or restated from time to time, the &#147;<B>2000 Note Agreement</B>&#148;), </FONT>
</P>



<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">
<FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">with the Company pursuant to which the 2000 Noteholders have purchased from the Company its 8.59% Senior Notes due November&nbsp;21, 2008, in the aggregate
principal amount of $60,000,000 (the &#147;<B>2000 Notes</B>&#148;); </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2"><B><I>1.4.</I></B> The parties hereto wish to define their rights and obligations with respect to each other such that, after a Notice of Election to Share has been sent and so long as such notice remains in effect, any payments by a
Obligor of the Company received by any Creditor on account of the Noteholder Obligations, the Loan Obligations or any Parity Debt Agreement Obligations shall be shared among all Creditors equally and ratably in accordance with their respective
Sharing Percentages, all as set forth in this Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>2.</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>INTERPRETATION OF THIS AGREEMENT </B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>2.1.</I></B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Defined Terms. </I></B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">As used in this Agreement, capitalized terms have the respective meanings specified below or set forth in the section of this Agreement
referred to immediately following such term (such definitions, unless otherwise expressly provided, to be equally applicable to both the singular and plural forms of the terms defined): </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Additional Obligor</I></B> &#150; means a Foreign Subsidiary of the Company (i)&nbsp;designated by the
Company as an &#147;Additional Obligor&#148;, (ii)&nbsp;all of whose lenders have become a party to this Agreement in accordance with Section&nbsp;5.4 of this Agreement and (iii)&nbsp;the Company has entered into a guaranty of such Foreign
Subsidiary&#146;s debt owing to such lenders. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2"><B><I>Agent</I></B> &#150; has the meaning given to &#147;Administrative Agent&#148; as set forth in the Credit Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Agreement, this</I></B> &#150; means this Sharing Agreement, as it may be amended, modified, supplemented or restated from time to
time. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Barnes Switzerland</I></B> &#150;
has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;1.2 of this Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Commitment</I></B> &#150; has the meaning set forth in the Credit Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Company</I></B> &#150; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;1.1 of this Agreement. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Company Loan Documents</I></B> &#150; means, as
applicable, the 1999 Note Agreement, the 2000 Note Agreement, the Loan Documents and any Parity Debt Agreements. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Credit Agreement</I></B> &#150; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;1.2 of this Agreement. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Creditor Joinder Agreement</I></B> &#150; has the
meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;5.4(a) of this Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Creditors</I></B> &#150; means, collectively, the Lenders, the Noteholders and the Parity Debtholders. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">-2- </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Distribution Agent</I></B> &#150; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;3.3(a)
of this Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Event of
Default</I></B> &#150; means an &#147;Event of Default,&#148; as defined in any of the 1999 Note Agreement, the Credit Agreement, the 2000 Note Agreement or any Parity Debt Agreement, as the case may be. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Foreign Subsidiaries</I></B> &#150; means any
Subsidiary organized under the laws of a jurisdiction other than the United States of America or one its states or the District of Columbia. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Issuing Bank </I></B>&#150; has the meaning set forth in the Credit Agreement. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Lenders</I></B> &#150; has the meaning set forth in
the Credit Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Letter of
Credit</I></B> &#150; has the meaning set forth in the Credit Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Letter of Credit Obligations</I></B> &#150; has the meaning set forth in the Credit Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Loan Documents</I></B> &#150; means the &#147;Loan Documents&#148;, as defined in the Credit Agreement. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Loan Obligations</I></B> &#150; means, collectively,
without duplication (a)&nbsp;all amounts owing by the Company and its Subsidiaries to the Lenders (including the Issuing Bank) and the Agent, pursuant to the terms of the Credit Agreement and the other Loan Documents in respect of principal,
interest, reimbursement obligations, fees (including facility and agent fees) and expenses (including breakage costs) <U>plus</U> (b)&nbsp;the aggregate undrawn amount of all unexpired Letters of Credit. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Net Lender Exposure</I></B> &#150; means in connection
with any Sharing Payment by the Lenders with respect to the Clawback Period, the difference, if any, of (i)&nbsp;the outstanding Loan Obligations on the first day of the Clawback Period and (ii)&nbsp;the outstanding Loan Obligations on the date the
Notice of Election to Share is received by the Creditors. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>1999 Noteholders</I></B> &#150; has the meaning set forth in the first paragraph of this Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>1999 Note Agreement</I></B> &#150; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;1.1 of this Agreement. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>1999 Notes </I></B>&#150; has the meaning set forth in
Section&nbsp;1.1 of this Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2"><B><I>Noteholder Obligations</I></B> &#150; means, collectively, without duplication, all amounts owing by the Company and its Subsidiaries to (a)&nbsp;the 1999 Noteholders, pursuant to the terms of the 1999 Note Agreement and the other
documents, agreements and instruments executed in connection therewith (including any related notes), in respect of principal, interest, Make-Whole Price (as such term is defined in the 1999 Note Agreement), fees and expenses and (b)&nbsp;the 2000
Noteholders, pursuant to the terms of the 2000 Note </FONT>
</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">-3- </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%">
<FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Agreement and the other documents, agreements and instruments executed in connection therewith (including any related notes), in respect of principal,
interest, Make-Whole Price (as each such term is defined in the 2000 Note Agreement), fees and expenses. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Noteholders</I></B> &#150; means, collectively, the 1999 Noteholders and the 2000 Noteholders. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Notice of Election to Share </I></B>&#150; a Notice in
substantially the form of <U>Exhibit A</U> attached hereto, executed and delivered by the Requisite 1999 Noteholders, the Requisite 2000 Noteholders, the Agent (on behalf of the Requisite Lenders) or the Requisite Parity Debtholders, as the case may
be, pursuant to Section&nbsp;3.1 hereof, which Notice shall invoke the sharing provisions provided for herein. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Notice of Shared Payment</I></B> &#150; means a written notification given by or on behalf of any Creditor stating that such
Creditor has received a Shared Payment. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2"><B><I>Obligations</I></B> &#150; means, collectively, the Loan Obligations, the Noteholder Obligations and the Parity Debt Agreement Obligations. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Obligors</I></B> &#150; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;1.2 of this Agreement. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Original Lenders</I></B> &#150; has the meaning set
forth in the first paragraph of this Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2"><B><I>Parity Debt Agreements</I></B> &#150; has the meaning set forth in the first paragraph of this Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Parity Debtholders</I></B> &#150; has the meaning set forth in the first paragraph of this Agreement. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Parity Debt Agreement Obligations</I></B> &#150; means
as to any particular Parity Debt Agreement, all payment obligations of the Company and all its Subsidiaries to the Parity Debtholders under such Parity Debt Agreement and the documents, agreements and/or instruments executed in connection therewith
in respect of principal, interest, reimbursement obligations, premiums, breakage, make-whole payments, fees and expenses with respect to such Parity Debt Agreement Obligations. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Person</I></B> &#150; means an individual, partnership, corporation (including a business trust),
limited liability company or partnership, joint stock company, trust, unincorporated association, joint venture, governmental agency or other authority. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Receiving Creditor</I></B> &#150; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;3.2 of this Agreement. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Requisite Creditors</I></B> &#150; means the Requisite
1999 Noteholders, the Requisite Lenders, the Requisite 2000 Noteholders and, so long as Parity Debtholders hold Obligations aggregating at least 33-1/3% of all Obligations outstanding at such time, the Requisite Parity Debtholders under each Parity
Debt Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">-4- </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Requisite Lenders</I></B> &#150; means, at any time, those Lenders which are then
in compliance with their obligations under the Credit Agreement holding (a)&nbsp;51% of the Commitments of such Lenders or (b)&nbsp;in the event the Commitments shall have expired or been terminated, 51% of the then outstanding Loan Obligations of
such Lenders. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Requisite 1999
Noteholders</I></B> &#150; means the holder or holders of at least 51% of the aggregate principal amount of the Noteholder Obligations owing to the 1999 Noteholders from time to time outstanding, exclusive of Noteholder Obligations owing to the 1999
Noteholders then owned by any one or more of the Obligors, any Subsidiary of any Obligor or any affiliate of any Obligor (including, without limitation, all Subsidiaries that are not Obligors). </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Requisite Parity Debtholders</I></B> &#150; means the
holder or holders of at least the minimum percentage of the aggregate principal amount of the Parity Debt Agreement Obligations outstanding under any Parity Debt Agreement necessary to permit such holders to cause such principal to become due and
payable prior to its scheduled maturity date, exclusive of any such Parity Debtholder Agreement Obligations then owned by any one or more of the Obligors, any Subsidiary of any Obligor or any affiliate of any Obligor. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Requisite 2000 Noteholders</I></B> &#150; means the
holder or holders of at least 51% of the aggregate principal amount of the Noteholder Obligations owing to the 2000 Noteholders from time to time outstanding, exclusive of Noteholder Obligations owing to the 2000 Noteholders then owned by any one or
more of the Obligors, any Subsidiary of any Obligor or any affiliate of any Obligor (including, without limitation, all Subsidiaries that are not Obligors). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Reserve Account</I></B> &#150; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;3.2(a) of this Agreement. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Shared Payment</I></B> &#150; has the meaning set
forth in Section&nbsp;3.2(a) of this Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2"><B><I>Sharing Percentage</I></B> &#150; means, with respect to any Creditor, the percentage equal to (a)&nbsp;the sum of (i)&nbsp;the amount of the then outstanding Obligations owed to such Creditor <U>plus</U> (ii)&nbsp;with respect to any
Lender, its <U>pro</U> <U>rata</U> share of the Letter of Credit Obligations determined in accordance with the Credit Agreement divided by (b)&nbsp;the sum of (i)&nbsp;the amount of the then outstanding Obligations owed to all Creditors <U>plus</U>
(ii)&nbsp;the aggregate amount of the Letter of Credit Obligations. In determination of the Sharing Percentage any amounts not denominated in US Dollars will be converted to the US Dollar Equivalent thereof. With respect to any Shared Payment
received during the Clawback Period each Creditor&#146;s Sharing Percentage shall be determined as of the first day of the Clawback Period without giving effect to any payments received during such Clawback Period. With respect to any Shared Payment
received after the Clawback Period, each Creditor&#146;s Sharing Percentage shall be determined as of the first day of the Event of Default after giving effect to any Shared Payments received during the Clawback Period. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Subsidiary </I></B>&#150; means, as to any Person, a
corporation, partnership or other entity of which shares of stock or other ownership interests having ordinary voting power (other </FONT>
</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">-5- </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%">
<FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">than stock or such other ownership interests having such power only by reason of the happening of a contingency) to elect a majority of the board of
directors or other managers of such corporation, partnership or other entity are at the time owned, or the management of which is otherwise controlled, directly or indirectly through one or more intermediaries, or both, by such Person. Unless
otherwise qualified, all references to a &#147;Subsidiary&#148; or to &#147;Subsidiaries&#148; in this Agreement shall refer to a Subsidiary or Subsidiaries of the Company. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Total Commitment</I></B> &#150; has the meaning set forth in the Credit Agreement. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>2000 Noteholders</I></B> &#150; has the meaning set
forth in the first paragraph of this Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2"><B><I>2000 Note Agreement</I></B> &#150; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;1.3 of this Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>2000 Notes</I></B> &#150; has the meaning set forth in Section&nbsp;1.3 of this Agreement. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>U.S.&nbsp;Dollar Equivalent</I></B> &#150; means, at
any time of determination, with regard to any amount designated in a currency other than U.S Dollars, the equivalent amount in U.S. Dollars determined using the Specified Exchange Rate as of the business day immediately prior to such date of
determination. For purposes hereof, &#147;Specified Exchange Rate&#148; means the rate at which such other currency may be exchanged into U.S. Dollars as set forth at 10:00 a.m., New York City time on the applicable date (for spot delivery) on the
applicable Bloomberg Key Cross Currency Rates Page FXC (or any successor thereto); in the event that such rate does not appear on such page, the Specified Exchange Rate shall be determined by reference to such other nationally recognized, publicly
available service for displaying exchange rates selected by the Requisite 1999 Holders, the Requisite 2000 Holders and the Agent for such purposes. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>2.2.</I></B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Certain Other Terms. </I></B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The words &#147;hereof,&#148; &#147;herein&#148; and &#147;hereunder&#148; and words of similar import when used in this Agreement shall
refer to this Agreement as a whole and not to any particular provision of this Agreement. Section references are to this Agreement unless otherwise specified. All terms defined in this Agreement in the singular shall have comparable meanings when
used in the plural, and vice versa, unless otherwise specified. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>3.</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>PAYMENTS, ETC.; CONSENTS AND JOINDERS </B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>3.1.</I></B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Notice of Election to Share; Receipt of Shared Payment. </I></B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>(a)</B> Upon and during the continuance of an Event of Default, </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(i) the Requisite 1999 Noteholders may invoke the sharing provisions hereof by sending to the Agent and the
other Creditors (other than the Lenders) a Notice of Election to Share signed by the Requisite 1999 Noteholders; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">-6- </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(ii) the Requisite Lenders may invoke the sharing provisions hereof by having the Agent
send to the Creditors (other than the Lenders) a Notice of Election to Share signed by the Agent on behalf of the Requisite Lenders; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(iii) the Requisite 2000 Noteholders may invoke the sharing provisions hereof by sending to the Agent and the other Creditors (other than
the Lenders) a Notice of Election to Share signed by the Requisite 2000 Noteholders; or </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(iv) the Requisite Parity Debtholders, so long as such Parity Debtholders hold at least 33 1/3% of the then outstanding Obligations, may
invoke the sharing provisions hereof by sending to the Agent and the other Creditors (other than the Lenders) a Notice of Election to Share signed by the Requisite Parity Debtholders. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>(b)</B> A Notice of Election to Share shall be sent by a Creditor or the Agent, as the case may be, by
overnight courier for receipt the next business day. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2"><B>(c)</B> Once a Notice of Election to Share has been sent pursuant to paragraph (a)&nbsp;above, as the case may be, such Notice shall remain in effect until the Requisite Creditors shall agree otherwise in writing, notwithstanding that
the Event of Default triggering the sending of such Notice may be waived; provided that the Person(s) sending such Notice may revoke such Notice by giving written notice to each other Creditor (other than a Lender) and the Agent so long as no
obligation pursuant to Section&nbsp;3.2 on the part of any Creditor has arisen prior to such revocation. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>(d)</B> On and after the date that a Creditor (other than a Lender) shall send or receive a Notice of Election to Share in accordance
with the provisions hereof, such Creditor shall give a Notice of Shared Payment to each other Creditor (other than a Lender) and the Agent promptly upon obtaining actual knowledge of the receipt by such Creditor of a Shared Payment. The Agent shall
promptly send any such notice to the Lenders. On and after the date that the Agent shall receive or send a Notice of Election to Share in accordance with the provisions hereof, the Agent shall give a Notice of Shared Payment to each Creditor
promptly upon obtaining actual knowledge of the receipt by the Agent or any Lender of a Shared Payment. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>3.2.</I></B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Sharing of Payments. </I></B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>(a)</B> Each Creditor (a &#147;<B>Receiving Creditor</B>&#148;) agrees that on and after the delivery by such Creditor (or in the case
of the Lenders, by the Agent) of a Notice of Election to Share or its (or, in the case of the Lenders, the Agent&#146;s) receipt of a Notice of Election to Share, in each case in accordance with the provisions hereof, and so long as such Notice has
not been terminated pursuant to Section&nbsp;3.1(c) hereof, any payment of any kind (including, without limitation, any payment resulting from a set-off of a deposit account, any offset or any payment or distribution made in the context of any
insolvency or reorganization proceeding) received by it within 90 days prior to the applicable Event of Default (the &#147;<B>Clawback Period</B>&#148;) and at any time thereafter on account of the Obligations (such payment, a &#147;<B>Shared
Payment</B>&#148;), directly or indirectly, from or on behalf of any Obligor is to be distributed to each Creditor equally and ratably in accordance with the respective Sharing Percentage of each Creditor without </FONT>
</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">-7- </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%">
<FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">discrimination or preference; provided that Shared Payments received by the Lenders during the Clawback Period shall be equal to the Net Lender Exposure.
Notwithstanding the foregoing, to the extent that any amounts available for distribution pursuant to this Section&nbsp;3.2 are attributable to the Loan Obligations that relate to undrawn amounts under Letters of Credit, such amounts shall be held in
a reserve or other account unavailable to the Company or any Subsidiary thereof (the &#147;<B>Reserve Account</B>&#148;) to be established by the Agent. Amounts in the Reserve Account shall be used from time to time to pay the applicable Loan
Obligations in respect of the Letters of Credit as they become due. Any amounts remaining in the Reserve Account following the expiration or satisfaction in full of the Loan Obligations in respect of the Letters of Credit for which such sums were
held in reserve shall be applied against any Obligations remaining unpaid in accordance with this Section&nbsp;3.2. Prior to the appointment of the Distribution Agent, as set forth in Section&nbsp;3.3(a) hereof, each Receiving Creditor shall hold
all Shared Payments received by it in trust for the benefit of all Creditors. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>(b)</B> Each Obligor hereby grants to the Agent a lien on and security interest in the Reserve Account and all funds or other assets contained therein or credited thereto to secure first, the Letter of Credit
Obligations and then all other Obligations. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>3.3.</I></B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Distribution Agent. </I></B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>(a)</B> <B><I>Appointment.</I></B> Each Creditor agrees that upon the sending of a Notice of Election to Share in accordance with and
pursuant to Section&nbsp;3.1 hereof, the Requisite Creditors shall in good faith promptly seek to appoint an agent (the &#147;<B>Distribution Agent</B>&#148;) to distribute Shared Payments to the Creditors. If no Distribution Agent shall have been
appointed by the Requisite Creditors and accepted appointment in the manner hereinafter provided within 30 days after the sending of such Notice of Election to Share, any Creditor may petition any court of competent jurisdiction in New York City for
the appointment of the Distribution Agent. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2"><B>(b)</B> <B><I>Acceptance of Appointment.</I></B> The Distribution Agent appointed hereunder shall execute, acknowledge and deliver to each Creditor an instrument accepting such appointment and agreeing to be bound by the terms of this
Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>(c)</B> <B><I>Remittance and
Distribution.</I></B> Upon the appointment of the Distribution Agent, each Receiving Creditor shall remit any Shared Payment received by it to the Distribution Agent for distribution in accordance with Section&nbsp;3.2 hereof. Upon receipt of any
Shared Payment, the Distribution Agent shall calculate the amount of such Shared Payment distributable to each Creditor pursuant to Section&nbsp;3.2 hereof as of the date the Receiving Creditor received such Shared Payment and remit such amount to
each Creditor, accompanied by computations in reasonable detail showing the manner of calculation of the amounts distributable to each Creditor pursuant to Section&nbsp;3.2 hereof. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>3.4.</I></B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Invalidated Payments. </I></B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">If any amount distributed by the Distribution Agent to the Creditors in accordance with the provisions of this Agreement is subsequently
required to be returned or repaid to any Obligor or their representatives or successors in interest, whether by court order, settlement or otherwise, each Creditor shall, promptly upon its receipt of notice thereof (together with </FONT>
</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">-8- </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%">
<FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">information explaining why such amount is required to be returned or repaid) from the Distribution Agent, pay to the Distribution Agent the pro rata portion
received by it of such amount (without interest) for payment to the appropriate Creditor or Obligor or its representatives or successors in interest, as the case may be. If any such amounts are subsequently recovered by any Creditor from any Obligor
or its representatives or successors in interest, such Creditor shall remit such amounts to the Distribution Agent and the Distribution Agent shall redistribute such amounts to the Creditors on the same basis as such amounts were originally
distributed. The obligations of the Creditors and the Distribution Agent under this Section&nbsp;3.4 shall survive the repayment of the Obligations and termination of the Loan Documents, the 1999 Note Agreement, the 2000 Note Agreement and any
Parity Debt Agreement and related documents. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>3.5.</I></B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Application of Shared Payments. </I></B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Each Obligor and each Creditor agrees that, to the extent a Receiving Creditor does not retain all or any portion of a Shared Payment,
such Receiving Creditor shall be deemed to have only applied the amount retained by such Receiving Creditor in payment of the Obligations owing to such Receiving Creditor. Each other Creditor which is allocated a portion of a Shared Payment in
accordance with Section&nbsp;3.2 shall be deemed to have received such allocated portion as a direct payment of such other Creditor&#146;s Obligations. The Creditors and the Obligors agree that no Creditors Company Loan Documents shall be satisfied
until such time such Creditor has received and retained (after giving effect to all Sharing Payments) payment in full in cash of its Obligations. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>3.6.</I></B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Additional Obligor </I></B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">A Subsidiary of the Company shall execute and deliver to the Agent and the Creditors an Additional Obligor Joinder Agreement in the form
attached hereto as <U>Exhibit B</U> (as amended, supplemented, restated or otherwise modified, an &#147;<B>Additional Obligor Joinder Agreement</B>&#148;) upon being designated an &#147;Additional Obligor&#148; by the Company. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>4.</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>DISTRIBUTION AGENT </B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>4.1.</I></B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Distributions and Consents. </I></B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">In making the distributions to the Creditors provided for in Section&nbsp;3 hereof, the Distribution Agent may rely upon information
available to it or supplied by each Creditor to it with respect to the amount and composition (<U>i.e</U>., as to principal and other amounts) of the Obligations owing to each Creditor, and the Distribution Agent shall have no liability to any
Creditor for actions taken in reliance on such information in the absence of its gross negligence or willful misconduct. Each of the Creditors hereby agrees, on two business days&#146; telephonic, telegraphic, telexed, overnight courier or similar
notice from the Distribution Agent, to confirm to the Distribution Agent in writing, including by telecopy of a signed confirmation or by telex, the outstanding balance of the Obligations, if any (and, if requested by the Distribution Agent,
itemized as to principal, reimbursement obligations, interest, fees, premiums and other amounts, if any), owing to such Creditor as of the date or dates specified in such notice. In the event of any distribution to any Creditor in lawful currency of
any other jurisdiction (the &#147;<B>Other</B> </FONT>
</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">-9- </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%">
<FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Currency</B>&#148;) than the currency of the jurisdiction in which such Obligations are payable (the &#147;<B>Contractual Currency</B>&#148;) shall
constitute a discharge of such Creditor&#146;s Obligations only to the extent of the amount of the Contractual Currency which such Creditor could purchase in the London foreign exchange markets with the amount of the Other Currency in accordance
with normal banking procedures at the rate of exchange prevailing on the first day (other than a Saturday) on which banks in London are generally open for business following receipt of the payment first referred to above. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>4.2.</I></B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Appointment, Powers of Distribution Agent. </I></B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Each of the Creditors, by its entering into this Agreement, hereby appoints and authorizes the Distribution Agent to act as its agent
hereunder with such powers as are specifically delegated to the Distribution Agent by the terms of this Agreement, together with such powers as are reasonably incidental thereto. The Distribution Agent shall not have a fiduciary relationship in
respect of any Creditor by reason of this Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>4.3.</I></B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Liability. </I></B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Distribution Agent shall have no duties to the Creditors under this Agreement except those expressly set forth herein. Neither the
Distribution Agent nor any of its officers, directors, employees or agents shall be liable to any Creditor for any action taken or omitted by it or them hereunder or in connection herewith, unless caused by its or their gross negligence or willful
misconduct. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>4.4.</I></B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Resignation or Removal of Distribution Agent. </I></B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Distribution Agent may resign and be discharged of its duties hereunder by giving written notice thereof to all holders of the
Obligations then outstanding. Such resignation shall take effect at such time as a successor distribution agent shall have been appointed or, if no successor is appointed before then, upon ninety (90)&nbsp;days prior written notice to each Creditor.
The Distribution Agent may be removed at any time with or without cause by the Requisite Creditors. Upon any such resignation or removal, the Requisite Creditors shall have the right to appoint a successor distribution agent. Upon the acceptance of
any appointment as distribution agent hereunder by a successor distribution agent, such successor distribution agent shall thereupon succeed to and become vested with all of the rights, powers, privileges and duties of the retiring Distribution
Agent. After any retiring Distribution Agent&#146;s resignation or removal hereunder as Distribution Agent, the provisions of this Section&nbsp;4 shall continue in effect for its benefit in respect of any actions taken or omitted to be taken by it
while it was acting as the Distribution Agent. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>4.5.</I></B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Employment of Agents and Counsel. </I></B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Distribution Agent may execute any of its duties as Distribution Agent hereunder by or through employees, agents and attorneys-in-fact
and shall not be answerable to the Creditors, except as to money or securities received by it or its authorized agents, for the default or misconduct of any such agents or attorneys-in-fact selected by it with reasonable care. The Distribution Agent
shall be entitled to advice of counsel concerning all matters pertaining to the agency hereby created and its duties hereunder. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">-10- </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>4.6.</I></B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Reliance on Documents; Counsel. </I></B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Distribution Agent shall be entitled to rely upon any notice, consent, certificate, affidavit, letter, telegram, statement, paper or
document believed by it to be genuine and correct and to have been signed or sent by the proper Person or Persons, and, with respect to legal matters, upon the opinion or advice of counsel selected by the Distribution Agent, which counsel may be
employees of the Distribution Agent. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>4.7.</I></B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Distribution Agent&#146;s Reimbursement and Indemnification. </I></B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>(a)</B> The Obligors, jointly and severally, shall reimburse and indemnify the Distribution Agent for expenses incurred by the
Distribution Agent on behalf of the Creditors, in connection with the execution, delivery, administration and enforcement of this Agreement and for any liabilities, obligations, losses, damages, penalties, actions, judgments, suits, costs, expenses
or disbursements of any kind and nature whatsoever which may be imposed on, incurred by or asserted against the Distribution Agent in any way relating to or arising out of this Agreement or any other document delivered in connection herewith or the
transactions contemplated hereby, or the enforcement of any of the terms hereof, <I>provided</I> that the Obligors shall not be liable for any of the foregoing to the extent they arise from the gross negligence or willful misconduct of the
Distribution Agent. The obligations of the Obligors under this Section&nbsp;4.7 shall survive payment of the Obligations and termination of this Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>(b)</B> Without limiting the obligations of the Obligors, the Creditors severally agree to, in accordance with their respective Sharing
Percentages (determined as of the date of delivery of the relevant request for reimbursement or indemnification), reimburse and indemnify the Distribution Agent for expenses incurred by the Distribution Agent on behalf of the Creditors, in
connection with the execution, delivery, administration and enforcement of this Agreement and for any liabilities, obligations, losses, damages, penalties, actions, judgments, suits, costs, expenses or disbursements of any kind and nature whatsoever
which may be imposed on, incurred by or asserted against the Distribution Agent in any way relating to or arising out of this Agreement or any other document delivered in connection herewith or the transactions contemplated hereby, or the
enforcement of any of the terms hereof, <I>provided</I> that the Creditors shall not be liable for any of the foregoing to the extent they arise from the gross negligence or willful misconduct of the Distribution Agent. The obligations of the
Creditors under this Section&nbsp;4.7 shall survive payment of the Obligations and termination of this Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>4.8.</I></B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Rights as Creditor. </I></B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">In the event the Distribution Agent, in its individual capacity, is a Creditor, the Distribution Agent shall have the same rights and
powers hereunder in such capacity as any Creditor and may exercise the same as though it were not the Distribution Agent, and the term &#147;Creditor&#148; or &#147;Creditors&#148; shall, at any time when the Distribution Agent is a Creditor, unless
the context otherwise indicates, include the Distribution Agent in its individual capacity. The Distribution Agent in its individual capacity may accept deposits from, lend money to, and generally engage in any kind of trust, debt, equity or other
transaction, in addition to those </FONT>
</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">-11- </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%">
<FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">contemplated by this Agreement, with the Company and its Subsidiaries. The Distribution Agent, in its individual capacity, is not obligated to be a Creditor.
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>5.</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>MISCELLANEOUS </B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>5.1.</I></B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Governing Law. </I></B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>THIS AGREEMENT SHALL BE CONSTRUED, INTERPRETED AND ENFORCED IN ACCORDANCE WITH, AND GOVERNED BY, THE INTERNAL LAWS OF THE STATE OF NEW
YORK. </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>5.2.</I></B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Creditor Credit Decision. </I></B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Each Creditor acknowledges that it has, independently and without reliance upon any other Creditor and based on the financial statements
prepared by the Company and its Subsidiaries and such other documents and information as it has deemed appropriate, made its own credit analysis and decision to enter into this Agreement. Each Creditor also acknowledges that it will, independently
and without reliance upon any other Creditor and based on such documents and information as it shall deem appropriate at the time, continue to make its own credit decisions in taking or not taking action under this Agreement. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>5.3.</I></B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Counterparts. </I></B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">This Agreement may be executed in several counterparts, each of which shall be deemed an original but all of which shall constitute one
agreement, and shall constitute a binding agreement when executed by each of the parties hereto. A facsimile or electronic copy of the signature of any party on any counterpart shall be effective as the signature of the party executing such
counterpart for purposes of effectiveness of this Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>5.4.</I></B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Successors and Assigns; Additional Creditors. </I></B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>(a)</B> This Agreement shall be binding upon and inure to the benefit of the successors and assigns of the parties hereto including any
assignees of the Obligations. Each Creditor agrees that it will not assign any of the Obligations unless the assignee agrees to become a party to and be bound by this Sharing Agreement by executing a Creditor Joinder Agreement in the form attached
hereto as <U>Exhibit C</U> (the &#147;<B>Creditor Joinder Agreement</B>&#148;), <I>provided</I> that the failure of any Creditor to obtain such acknowledgment shall not affect the effectiveness of the immediately preceding sentence. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>(b)</B> Any Parity Debtholder may, with the prior written
consent of the Agent, the Requisite 1999 Noteholders and the Requisite 2000 Noteholders (such consent not to be unreasonably withheld and shall be deemed to have been given unless the Agent, the Requisite 1999 Noteholders or the Requisite 2000
Noteholders, shall have notified the Creditors to the contrary within ten (10)&nbsp;business days of receipt of the request for such consent), become a party hereto and be subject to all the provisions hereof and entitled to the benefits hereof if
such Parity Debtholder shall execute and deliver to each other Creditor a Creditor Joinder Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">-12- </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>5.5.</I></B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Amendments. </I></B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">This Agreement may be amended only in writing executed by the Requisite Creditors. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>5.6.</I></B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Termination. </I></B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">This Agreement (except for Section&nbsp;3.4 and Section&nbsp;4.7) shall terminate upon the payment in full of all Obligations. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>5.7.</I></B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Cooperation. </I></B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Each party hereto agrees to cooperate fully with the other parties hereto, in the exercise of its reasonable judgment, to the end that the
terms and provisions of this Agreement may be promptly and fully carried out. Each party hereto also agrees, from time to time, to execute and deliver any and all other agreements, documents or instruments and to take such other actions, all as may
be reasonably necessary or desirable to effectuate the terms, provisions and the intent of this Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>5.8.</I></B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>No Waiver. </I></B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">No failure or delay on the part of any Creditor in exercising any right, power or remedy hereunder shall operate as a waiver thereof, nor
shall any single or partial exercise of any such right, power or remedy preclude any other or further exercise thereof or the exercise of any other right, power or remedy hereunder. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>5.9.</I></B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Notices. </I></B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">All written communications provided for hereunder shall be sent by first class mail or nationwide overnight delivery service, with charges
prepaid (<I>provided</I> that any Notice of Election to Share or Notice of Shared Payment or copy thereof to be sent by the Agent or a Creditor, as the case may be, shall be sent by nationwide overnight delivery service) and (i)&nbsp;if to any
Creditor (other than a Lender), addressed to such Creditor at the address specified in Annex 1 hereto or in a Creditor Joinder Agreement, or at such other address as such Creditor shall have specified to the other Creditors and the Agent in writing,
(ii)&nbsp;if to any Lender or the Agent, addressed to the Agent (and the Agent shall forward each such communication to each Lender) at the address specified in Annex 1 hereto, or at such other address as the Agent shall have specified to the
Creditors (other than the Lenders) and (iii)&nbsp;if to the Distribution Agent, addressed to the Distribution Agent at such address as the Distribution Agent shall have specified to each Creditor and the Agent in writing. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>5.10.</I></B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Notices of Events of Default. </I></B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Each Creditor agrees use its best efforts to promptly provide each other Creditor (other than the Lenders) and the Agent written notice of
any Event of Default arising under such Creditor&#146;s Loan Documents. The failure to provide such written notice shall not affect the rights of any Creditor hereunder. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">-13- </FONT></P>

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Agent. </I></B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Pursuant to Section&nbsp;14.1(e) of the Credit Agreement, (a)&nbsp;the Lenders have authorized the Agent to enter into, and act with
respect to, this Agreement on their behalf and (b)&nbsp;the Lenders agree to be bound by the terms hereof. Except as to any assignment pursuant to Section&nbsp;15.1 of the Credit Agreement, the Agent agrees on its behalf and behalf of each Lender
that no Lender shall be released from its obligations in respect of this Agreement or any Shared Payment without the prior written consent of the Requisite 1999 Noteholders, the Requisite 2000 Noteholders and the Requisite Parity Debtholders.
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

successors and assigns, shall have any rights under this Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">The Obligors agree to perform their obligations under Section&nbsp;3.5, Section&nbsp;3.6 and
Section&nbsp;4.7 and acknowledge that no consent or other action by them is necessary for any action to be taken under, or for any amendment of, this Sharing Agreement, including, without limitation, the appointment of the Distribution Agent or a
successor distribution agent, except that their consent shall be necessary for any amendment to Section&nbsp;3.5 or Section&nbsp;4.7. The Obligors hereof hereby grant to the Agent a security interest in and lien upon the Reserve Account and all
funds or other assets contained therein or credited thereto as security for (a)&nbsp;first, the Letter of Credit Obligations and (b)&nbsp;second, all other Obligations. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
