 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Annex 1 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Addresses of the Noteholders and the Agent </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>NOTEHOLDERS</U>: </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Annex 1-1 </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>EXHIBIT A </U></B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Form of Notice of Election to Share </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">[DATE] </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Re: <U>Sharing Agreement/Notice of Election to Share</U> </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Dear Sir or Madam: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Reference is hereby made to the Sharing Agreement, dated as of January&nbsp;11, 2006, among the holders of the Loan Obligations party thereto, the holders
of Noteholder Obligations party thereto, the holders of Parity Debt Agreement Obligations, if any, party thereto, and Bank of America, N.A., as Agent (as heretofore amended, modified, supplemented or restated from time to time, the &#147;<B>Sharing
Agreement</B>&#148;). Unless otherwise defined herein, terms defined in the Sharing Agreement are used herein as therein defined. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">An Event of Default has occurred by reason of [explain cause of Event of Default and sections of the relevant agreement which have been violated]. In
addition, other Events of Default may exist. In accordance with the Sharing Agreement, this Notice of Election to Share is hereby being sent to invoke the sharing provisions of the Sharing Agreement. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><DIV ALIGN="right">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>EXHIBIT B </U></B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>[FORM OF ADDITIONAL OBLIGOR JOINDER AGREEMENT] </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ADDITIONAL OBLIGOR JOINDER AGREEMENT </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>TO SHARING AGREEMENT </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">Reference is hereby made to the Sharing Agreement dated as of January&nbsp;11, 2006 (as it may have been amended, modified or otherwise supplemented, the &#147;<B>Sharing Agreement</B>&#148;) among the Lenders, the 1999 Noteholders, the
2000 Noteholders, the Parity Debtholders, if any, and Bank of America, N.A., as agent for the Lenders under the Credit Agreement. Capitalized terms used herein and not otherwise defined herein shall have the respective meanings specified in the
Sharing Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>WHEREAS</B>, pursuant to
Section&nbsp;3.6 of the Sharing Agreement the undersigned has been designated on &#147;Additional Obligor&#148; and agreed to execute this Joinder Agreement with respect to its Parity Debt Agreement Obligations. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>NOW THEREFORE</B>, in consideration thereof and for other good and
valuable consideration, the receipt of which is hereby acknowledged, the undersigned agrees as follows: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Section&nbsp;1. <B><I>Agreement to be Bound</I></B>. By executing and delivering this Joinder Agreement, the undersigned hereby agrees to become a party
to and be bound by, and comply with, the provisions of the acknowledgement to the Sharing Agreement in the same manner as if the undersigned were an original Obligor. The undersigned agrees that it shall be an Additional Obligor, as such term is
defined in the Sharing Agreement, and that the undersigned shall have all the obligations described therein. All references to the term &#147;Additional Obligor&#148; or &#147;Obligor&#148; in the Sharing Agreement, or in any document or instrument
executed and delivered or furnished, or to be executed and delivered or furnished, in connection therewith shall be deemed to be references to, and shall include, the undersigned. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Section&nbsp;2. <B><I>Governing Law</I></B>. This Joinder Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with
the substantive laws of the State of New York, without regard to any conflicts of law provisions thereof. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Exhibit B-1 </FONT></P>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><U>EXHIBIT C </U></B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>[FORM OF LENDER JOINDER AGREEMENT] </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>LENDER JOINDER AGREEMENT TO SHARING AGREEMENT </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Reference is hereby made to the Sharing Agreement dated as of January&nbsp;11, 2006 (as it may have been amended, modified
or otherwise supplemented, the &#147;<B>Sharing Agreement</B>&#148;) among the 1999 Noteholders, the 2000 Noteholders, the Parity Debtholders, if any, and Bank of America, N.A., as agent for the Lenders under the Credit Agreement. Capitalized terms
used herein and not otherwise defined herein shall have the meaning specified in the Sharing Agreement. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>WHEREAS</B>, the Sharing Agreement requires that any assignee of any Noteholder Obligations become a party to the Sharing Agreement contemporaneously
with acquiring such Noteholder Obligations; and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2"><B>WHEREAS</B>, the Sharing Agreement also provides that, subject to the terms thereof, any Parity Debtholder may become a party to the Sharing Agreement by executing this Joinder Agreement; and </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>WHEREAS</B>, the undersigned has agreed to execute this Joinder Agreement
in consideration of, and as a condition to, [becoming a Noteholder/becoming a Parity Debtholder]. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>NOW THEREFORE,</B> in consideration thereof and for other good and valuable consideration, the receipt of which is hereby acknowledged, the undersigned
agrees as follows: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Section&nbsp;1. <B><I>Agreement to be
Bound</I></B>. By executing and delivering this Joinder Agreement, the undersigned hereby agrees to become a Creditor under the Sharing Agreement and be bound by, and comply with, the provisions of the Sharing Agreement in the same manner as if the
undersigned were an original signatory to the Sharing Agreement. The undersigned agrees that it shall be a Creditor and [Noteholder/Parity Debtholder] under the Sharing Agreement, and that the undersigned shall have all the obligations described
therein with respect to the Obligations held by the undersigned. All references to the terms &#147;Creditor&#148; or &#147;[Noteholder/Parity Debtholder]&#148; in the Sharing Agreement, or in any document or instrument executed and delivered or
furnished, or to be executed and delivered or furnished, in connection therewith shall be deemed to be references to, and shall include, the undersigned. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Section&nbsp;2. <B><I>Notices</I></B>. Notices and other communications provided for under Sharing Agreement to be provided to the undersigned shall be
sent to the addresses set forth on Schedule I attached hereto. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">Section&nbsp;3. <B><I>Governing Law</I></B>. This Joinder Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the substantive laws of the State of New York, without regard to any conflicts of law provisions thereof. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Exhibit C-1 </FONT></P>

duly authorized officer, all as of the date and year set forth below. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><DIV ALIGN="right">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="right"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><U>EXHIBIT 4.3 (iii) </U></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>BARNES GROUP INC. </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><HR
WIDTH="17%" SIZE="1" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ASSUMPTION AND AMENDMENT
AGREEMENT </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P><HR WIDTH="17%" SIZE="1" NOSHADE COLOR="#000000"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Dated as of August&nbsp;26, 2005 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>re: </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>U.S. $24,500,000 7.66% Amended
and Restated Senior </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Notes due November&nbsp;12, 2007 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>U.S. $45,500,000 7.80% Amended and Restated Senior </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Notes due November&nbsp;12, 2010
</B></FONT></P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>BARNES GROUP INC.
</B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>123 Main Street </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2"><B>Bristol, Connecticut 06010 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>ASSUMPTION AND
AMENDMENT AGREEMENT </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>re: </B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>U.S. $24,500,000 7.66% Amended and Restated Senior </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Notes due November&nbsp;12, 2007 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>U.S. $45,500,000 7.80% Amended and Restated Senior
</B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Notes due November&nbsp;12, 2010 </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:2%; text-indent:-2%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">As of August&nbsp;26, 2005 </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>To the Persons identified on </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Schedule A and Schedule B attached
hereto </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:2%; text-indent:-2%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Ladies and Gentlemen: </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>BARNES GROUP INC</B>., a Delaware corporation (together with its
successors and assigns, &#147;<B>Barnes</B>&#148;), and <B>3031786 NOVA SCOTIA COMPANY</B>, a Nova Scotia company (together with its successors and assigns, &#147;<B>3031786</B>&#148;), hereby agree with you as follows: </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>1.</B></FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>BACKGROUND; SUCCESSION AND ASSUMPTION; AMENDMENTS AND RESTATEMENTS; CONSENT. </B></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>1.1. Background</B>. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a) <B>Issuance and Sale of 1999 Existing Notes</B>. Pursuant to that certain Note Purchase Agreement dated as of November&nbsp;12, 1999
(as amended up to, but excluding, the Effective Date, the &#147;<B>Existing Note Purchase Agreement</B>&#148;), entered into by 3031786 with each of the institutions named on Schedule A thereto, 3031786 issued its </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(i) 7.66% Senior Notes due November&nbsp;12, 2007 in the
original aggregate principal amount of U.S.$24,500,000 (collectively, as amended up to, but excluding, the Effective Date, the &#147;<B>Existing 7.66% Notes</B>&#148;); and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(ii) 7.80% Senior Notes due November&nbsp;12, 2010 in the original aggregate principal amount of
U.S.$45,500,000 (collectively, as amended up to, but excluding, the Effective Date, the &#147;<B>Existing 7.80% Notes</B>&#148;). The Existing 7.66% Notes and the Existing 7.80% Existing Notes are referred to, collectively, herein as the
&#147;<B>Existing Notes</B>&#148;. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">One hundred percent of the
original aggregate principal amount of the Existing Notes is outstanding and is held by the institutions identified as &#147;1999 Noteholders&#148; on the signature pages to this Assumption Agreement (collectively, the &#147;<B>1999
Noteholders</B>&#148;). </FONT></P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) <B>Relationship between 3031786 and Barnes</B>. 3031786 is, and since prior to the
Original Closing Date has been, a direct wholly-owned subsidiary of Barnes. Barnes has guaranteed the obligations of 3031786 pursuant to that certain Guaranty Agreement dated November&nbsp;12, 1999. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>1.2. 3031786 and Barnes&#146; Request for Consent. </B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">3031786 and Barnes hereby request that each of you grant your consent to the
following, as further provided in this Assumption Agreement: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a) the assumption by Barnes of the obligations of 3031786 under the Existing Notes and the Existing Note Purchase Agreement; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) the release of 3031786 of its obligations under the Existing Notes and the Existing Note Purchase Agreement (such release is
referred to herein as the &#147;<B>Release</B>&#148;); </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">(c) the amendment of certain terms and provisions of the Existing Note Purchase Agreement; and </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(d) the amendment and restatement of the Existing Notes, </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>1.3. Assumption by Barnes. </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Barnes has authorized its assumption of, and (subject to the effectiveness of your Consent as provided in Section&nbsp;1.6 hereof) hereby assumes and
shall be fully liable for, all of the obligations and undertakings of 3031786, whether now existing or hereafter arising, provided for in the Existing Note Purchase Agreement (as amended by this Assumption Agreement) and the Existing Notes (as
amended and restated pursuant to this Assumption Agreement), including, without limitation, the obligation to duly and punctually pay the principal of, and the interest and Make-Whole Price, if any, on, the Existing Notes (as amended and restated by
this Assumption Agreement) in accordance with the terms of the Existing Note Purchase Agreement (as amended by this Assumption Agreement) and the Existing Notes (as amended and restated by this Assumption Agreement). Such assumption and agreement by
Barnes is referred to herein as the &#147;<B>Assumption.</B>&#148; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2"><B>1.4. Amendments. </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a)
<B>Amendment of Existing Note Purchase Agreement</B>. Effective as of the Effective Date, the Existing Note Purchase Agreement is hereby amended (as so amended, the &#147;<B>Amended Note Agreement</B>&#148;) as follows: </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(i) <B>Amendments to Sections 4, 5 and 6. </B>Sections 4, 5
and 6 of the Existing Note Purchase Agreement are hereby amended by deleting all references to &#147;the Company&#148; or &#147;The Company&#148;, as applicable in such Sections and substituting &#147;Barnes&#148; in lieu thereof. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">2 </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(ii) <B>Amendments to Section&nbsp;7. </B>Section&nbsp;7 of the Existing Note Purchase
Agreement is deleted in its entirety and replaced in its entirety, for all purposes of the Amended Note Agreement, with the following: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;SECTION 7. COMPANY BUSINESS COVENANTS. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Barnes covenants that on and after the date of the Assumption Agreement until the Notes are paid in full: </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">7.1 Payment of Taxes and Claims. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Except in situations where the failure to pay would not
result in a material adverse impact on Barnes and its Subsidiaries taken as a whole, Barnes and each such Subsidiary, will pay, before they become delinquent, </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">all taxes, assessments and governmental charges or levies imposed upon it or its Property, and </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">all claims or demands of any kind (including, but not limited to, those of materialmen, mechanics, carriers, warehousemen, landlords and other like Persons) which, if unpaid, might
result in the creation of a Lien upon its Property not permitted by Section&nbsp;7.6, </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">provided that items of the foregoing description need not be paid while being contested in good faith and by appropriate proceedings, if and for so long
as book reserves reasonably believed by Barnes and independent certified public accountants of recognized national standing to be adequate have been established with respect thereto; provided further that, unless contesting in good faith in
accordance with the provisions hereof, notwithstanding the foregoing provisions of this Section&nbsp;7.1, Barnes and each such Subsidiary will pay all taxes known by Senior Management to be due and payable no later than fifteen days after the date
such taxes are due. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">7.2 Maintenance of
Properties and Corporate Existence. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a)
Except where the failure to do so would not have a material adverse impact on Barnes and its Subsidiaries taken as a whole, Barnes will and will cause each of its Subsidiaries to: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(i)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><U>Property</U> &#151; maintain its Property in good condition and make all necessary renewals, replacements, additions, betterments and improvements thereto required to keep such
Property in good condition and in compliance with all requirements of law; </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">3 </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(ii)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><U>Insurance</U> &#151; keep its properties adequately insured at all times, by financially sound and reputable insurers; maintain such other insurance, to such extent and against
such risks, including fire and other risks insured against by extended coverage as is customary with companies in the same or similar businesses located or operating in areas with similar geological conditions; maintain in full force and effect
public liability insurance against claims for personal injury or death or property damage occurring upon, in, about or in connection with the use of any properties owned, occupied or controlled by it, in such amounts as Barnes or any Subsidiary, as
the case may be, shall reasonably deem necessary; and maintain such other insurance as may be required by law; </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(iii)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><U>Financial Records</U> &#151; keep true books of records and accounts in which full and correct entries will be made of all of its business transactions, and will reflect in its
financial statements adequate accruals and appropriations to reserves, all in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles, consistently applied; and </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(iv)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><U>Corporate Existence and Rights</U> &#151; do or cause to be done all things necessary to preserve and keep in full force and effect its existence, rights and franchises, except
as otherwise permitted by Section&nbsp;7.4, <U>provided</U>, <U>however</U>, that Barnes may liquidate or sell any Subsidiary if the transaction is permitted by Section&nbsp;7.4. </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) Barnes will and will cause each of its Subsidiaries to
comply with all laws, ordinances or governmental rules or regulations to which each of them is subject, including, without limitation, Environmental Laws, and except as disclosed on Exhibit D, will obtain and maintain in effect all licenses,
certificates, permits, franchises and other governmental authorizations necessary to the ownership of their respective properties or to the conduct of their respective business, in each case to the extent failure to so comply, maintain or obtain
could, individually or in the aggregate, reasonably be expected to have a material adverse effect on Barnes or any Subsidiary. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">7.3 Maintenance of Office. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Barnes will maintain an office in the State of Connecticut where notices, presentations and demands in respect of the Assumption Agreement
or the Notes may be made upon it. The office shall be maintained at 123 Main Street, Bristol, Connecticut 06010, until such time as Barnes shall notify the holders of the Notes of a change of location. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">4 </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">7.4 Sale of Assets or Merger. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a) <U>Sale of Assets</U> &#151; Barnes will not, nor will
it permit any of its Subsidiaries to, directly or indirectly, except in the ordinary course of business, sell, lease, transfer or otherwise dispose of any of its Property or assets, now owned or hereafter acquired, if, as a result of such sale,
lease, transfer or disposition, the aggregate net book value or fair market value , whichever shall be higher, of all Property and assets sold, leased, transferred or otherwise disposed of by Barnes and its Subsidiaries in the then current fiscal
year of Barnes would exceed an amount equal to 10% of the book value (computed in accordance with GAAP) of all Property and assets of Barnes and its Consolidated Subsidiaries at the end of the preceding year. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) <U>Consolidation; Merger</U> &#151; Barnes will not, nor
will it permit any of its Subsidiaries to, directly or indirectly, consolidate with or merge into any other corporation, or permit another corporation to merge into it, <U>provided</U>, <U>however</U>, that (i)&nbsp;any Subsidiary of Barnes may be
merged into Barnes or another wholly-owned Subsidiary, (ii)&nbsp;Barnes or any Subsidiary of Barnes may merge or consolidate with another Person or business, if Barnes or such Subsidiary, as the case may be, is the surviving corporation,
(iii)&nbsp;Barnes or any Subsidiary may consolidate with or merge with another Person or business in a transaction where Barnes or the Subsidiary is not the surviving entity if (1)&nbsp;the continuing or surviving entity shall assume in writing all
of the obligations of Barnes under this Agreement, the Assumption Agreement and the Notes, (2)&nbsp;the continuing or surviving entity shall not, immediately after such merger or consolidation, be in default of any of Barnes&#146; obligations under
this Agreement, the Assumption Agreement or the Notes, (3)&nbsp;the continuing or surviving entity shall be a corporation organized under the laws of the United States or any state thereof, and (4)&nbsp;after giving effect to such consolidation or
merger, the continuing or surviving entity could incur $1 of additional Indebtedness under Section&nbsp;7.7. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">7.5 Leases. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Barnes will not, nor will it not permit any of its Subsidiaries, directly or indirectly, to incur, create or assume any commitment to make
any direct or indirect payment, whether as rent or otherwise, under any lease, rental or other arrangement for the use of real or personal Property or both of any other Person unless (a)&nbsp;after giving effect to such lease the aggregate rental
obligations of Barnes and its Subsidiaries (exclusive of obligations to pay taxes and rental increments attributable to escalator clauses) during any fiscal year shall not exceed an amount equal to 15% of the book value (computed in accordance with
GAAP) of all Properties and assets of Barnes and its Consolidated Subsidiaries at the end of the </FONT>
</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">5 </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%">
<FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">preceding fiscal year or (b)&nbsp;such lease was in existence as of the Closing Date and disclosed on Schedule I hereto. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">7.6 Liens and Encumbrances. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a) <U>Negative Pledge</U>. Barnes will not, nor will it
permit any of its Subsidiaries to, directly or indirectly, incur, create, assume or permit to exist any mortgage, pledge, security interest, lien, charge or other encumbrance of any nature whatsoever (including conditional sales or other title
retention agreements) on any of its Property or assets, whether owned at the date hereof or hereafter acquired, or assign, or permit any of its Subsidiaries to assign, any right to receive income, except: </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(i) liens incurred or pledges and deposits made in
connection with worker&#146;s compensation, unemployment insurance, old-age pensions, social security and public liability and similar legislation; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(ii) liens securing the performance of bids, tenders, leases, contracts (other than for the repayment of borrowed money), statutory
obligations, surety and appeal bonds and other obligations of like nature, incurred as an incident to and in the ordinary course of business; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(iii) statutory liens of landlords and other liens imposed by law, such as carriers&#146;, warehousemen&#146;s, mechanics&#146;,
materialmen&#146;s and vendors&#146; liens incurred in good faith in the ordinary course of business; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(iv) liens securing the payment of taxes, assessments and governmental charges or levies, either (1)&nbsp;not delinquent, or
(2)&nbsp;being contested in good faith by appropriate proceedings; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(v) zoning restrictions, easements, licenses, reservations, restrictions on the use of real property or minor irregularities incident thereto which do not in the aggregate materially detract from the value of the
Property or assets of Barnes or such Subsidiary, as the case may be, or impair the use of such Property in the operation of its business; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(vi) purchase money liens on real Property or equipment (which are filed against the real Property or equipment within 180 days of
purchase) that do not exceed 100% of the fair market value of the related Property; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(vii) liens existing on any Property prior to the acquisition thereof by Barnes or any Subsidiary, provided such lien was not created in
contemplation of such acquisition, the amount </FONT>
</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">6 </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%">
<FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">secured thereby does not exceed the fair market value of the Property and such lien does not extend to any other Property of Barnes or such Subsidiary;
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(viii) other liens, that in the aggregate, do
not exceed 15% of the book value (computed in accordance with GAAP) of all Properties and assets of Barnes and its Consolidated Subsidiaries at the end of the preceding fiscal year. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) <U>Equal and Ratable Lien; Equitable Lien</U>. In case any Property is subjected to a Lien in violation
of Section&nbsp;7.6(a), Barnes will make or cause to be made provision whereby the Notes will be secured pursuant to documents reasonably satisfactory to the holders of at least 51% in outstanding principal amount of the Notes (exclusive of Notes
owed by Barnes, Subsidiaries and Affiliates) equally and ratably, with all other obligations secured thereby, and in any case the Notes shall have the benefit, to the full extent that, and with such priority as, the holders may be entitled thereto
under applicable law, of an equitable Lien on such Property securing the Notes. Such violation of Section&nbsp;7.6(a) shall constitute an Event of Default hereunder, whether or not any such provision is made pursuant to this Section&nbsp;7.6(b).
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">7.7 Indebtedness. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Except to the extent permitted under Section&nbsp;7.7(e) and
(f), Barnes will not, nor will it permit any of its Subsidiaries to, directly or indirectly incur, create, assume or permit to exist any Indebtedness other than: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Indebtedness incurred by Barnes Group under the Revolving Credit Agreement; </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>

<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">the Notes; </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Indebtedness outstanding on the date hereof under Barnes Group Inc.&#146;s $25,000,000, 7.13% Senior Notes due December&nbsp;5, 2005; </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Indebtedness outstanding on the date hereof under Barnes Group Inc.&#146;s $60,000,000, 8.59% Senior Notes due November&nbsp;21, 2008; </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Indebtedness which constitutes extensions, renewals or replacements on substantially the same terms and conditions (and does not increase the amount outstanding) of (a)&nbsp;through
(c)&nbsp;above; and </FONT></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="left"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">additional Indebtedness of Barnes and its Subsidiaries; <U>provided</U>, <U>however</U>, that (i)&nbsp;the total Indebtedness of </FONT>
</P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">7 </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">


<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="13%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P>
<FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Barnes&#146; Subsidiaries shall not at any time exceed $100 million; (ii)&nbsp;total Indebtedness of Barnes&#146; Domestic Subsidiaries shall not at any time
exceed $10 million (excluding from the calculation thereof for all purposes except compliance with Section&nbsp;7.4(b)(4) any preexisting indebtedness of a newly acquired Domestic Subsidiary for a period not exceeding 90 days after acquisition of
such Domestic Subsidiary), and (iii)&nbsp;the aggregate amount of all Indebtedness of Barnes and its Subsidiaries at any time outstanding shall not exceed an amount equal to 155% of Consolidated Net Worth at such time; provided further that if any
Subsidiary shall have aggregate Indebtedness of at least $50,000,000, then the Company shall cause such Subsidiary&#146;s lenders to enter into an intercreditor agreement with the holders of the Notes in form and substance satisfactory to the
Required Holders. </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">7.8 Net
Worth. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Barnes will not permit Consolidated
Net Worth of Barnes and its Subsidiaries at any time to be less than $201 million plus 50% of Consolidated Net Income for each fiscal year beginning December&nbsp;31, 1999 (but without duplication for any fiscal year in which Consolidated Net Income
is a negative amount), with the annual adjustments to be applicable as of December&nbsp;31, 1999 and as of the end of each subsequent fiscal year. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">7.9 ERISA Compliance. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Neither Barnes nor any Related Person will at any time permit any Pension Plan maintained by it to: </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(i) engage in any &#147;prohibited transaction&#148; as such
term is defined in Section&nbsp;4975 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended, or described in Section&nbsp;406 of ERISA; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(ii) incur any &#147;accumulated funding deficiency&#148; as such term is defined in Section&nbsp;302 of ERISA, whether or not waived; or
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(iii) terminate under circumstances which
could result in the imposition of a Lien on the Property of Barnes or any Subsidiary pursuant to Section&nbsp;4068 of ERISA. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">7.10 Transactions with Affiliates. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Neither Barnes nor any Subsidiary will enter into any transaction (except transactions which do not in any one calendar year involve in
the </FONT>
</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">8 </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%">
<FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">aggregate an amount in excess of $500,000), including, without limitation, the purchase, sale or exchange of Property or the rendering of any service, with
any Affiliate except in the ordinary course of and pursuant to the reasonable requirements of Barnes or such Subsidiary&#146;s business and upon fair and reasonable terms no less favorable to Barnes or such Subsidiary than would be obtained in a
comparable arm&#146;s-length transaction with a Person not an Affiliate. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">7.11 Tax Consolidation. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Barnes will not file or consent to the filing of any consolidated income tax return with any Person other than a Subsidiary. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">7.12 Acquisition of Notes. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Neither Barnes nor any Subsidiary or any Affiliate will, directly or indirectly, acquire or make any offer to acquire any Notes unless
Barnes or such Subsidiary or Affiliate has offered to acquire the Notes, pro rata, from all holders of the Notes upon the same terms. In case any of such parties acquires any Notes, such Notes shall thereafter be cancelled and no Notes shall be
issued in substitution therefor. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">7.13 Lines
of Business. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Neither Barnes nor any
Subsidiary will engage in any line of business if as a result thereof the business of Barnes and its Subsidiaries taken as a whole would be substantially different from what it was at December&nbsp;31, 1998, as described in the Private Placement
Memorandum. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">7.14 Restricted Payments and
Restricted Investments. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Barnes will not nor
shall it permit any Subsidiary to, at any time make or permit to exist any loans or advances to, or purchase any stock, other securities or evidences of indebtedness of, or make or permit to exist any investment or acquire any interest whatsoever
in, any other Person, except (a)&nbsp;the purchase of Barnes&#146; common or preferred stock, (b)&nbsp;loans or advances of Barnes or any Subsidiary of Barnes (in addition to loans or advances permitted by clauses (d)&nbsp;and (e)&nbsp;of this
Section&nbsp;7.14) not in excess of $10,000,000 aggregate principal amount for Barnes and its Subsidiaries at any time outstanding, (c)&nbsp;investments of its cash by Barnes or any Subsidiary in (i)&nbsp;marketable direct obligations of, or
marketable obligations guaranteed by, the United States of America or Canada, or marketable obligations of any instrumentality or agency thereof, the payment of the principal and interest of which is unconditionally guaranteed by the United States
of America or Canada, (ii)&nbsp;certificates of deposit or other obligations issued by, or bankers&#146; acceptances of , any bank or trust company organized under the laws of the Federal Republic of Germany, France, the United Kingdom, Japan,
Canada or the United </FONT>
</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">9 </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%">
<FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">States of America or any state thereof (including foreign branches of any such bank or trust company) and having capital, surplus and undivided profits in
excess of $100,000,000, (iii)&nbsp;open market commercial paper with a maturity not in excess of 270 days form date of acquisition thereof and having the highest credit rating by either Standard&nbsp;&amp; Poor&#146;s Corporation or Moody&#146;s
Investors Service, Inc., or (iv)&nbsp;in the case of any foreign Subsidiary of Barnes in a country in which a Subsidiary exists as of the date of the Assumption Agreement, such investments of a comparable quality and term to the other investments
permitted by this clause (c)&nbsp;as are usually made in the jurisdiction or jurisdictions in which the business of such foreign Subsidiary is principally conducted by prudent corporate investors in like circumstances, (d)&nbsp;loans or advances of
Barnes to any of its Subsidiaries and loans or advances of any Subsidiary of Barnes to Barnes or another such Subsidiary, (e)&nbsp;purchases of stock or other securities of any corporations, associations or other business entities; <U>provided</U>,
<U>however</U>, that the aggregate cost to or fair market value of the consideration paid by Barnes and its Subsidiaries for such stock or securities of any such corporation, association or other business entity shall not exceed the sum of:
(A)&nbsp;$25,000,000, plus (B)&nbsp;50% of Consolidated Net Income for the period commencing on October&nbsp;1, 1999 and ending on the date of such stock or securities purchase (or minus 100% of Consolidated Net Income for such period if
Consolidated Net Income for such period is a loss) or (f)&nbsp;such other investments in an aggregate amount not to exceed $250,000 as Barnes or a Subsidiary may elect. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">7.15 Limitation on Restrictions on Dividends by Subsidiaries, etc. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Barnes shall not permit any Subsidiary or other entity in
which it or any of its subsidiaries has an equity investment (a &#147;Subsidiary Investment&#148;) to be or become subject to any restriction (except restrictions applicable to corporations generally and those restrictions set forth in the Revolving
Credit Agreement), whether arising by agreement, its articles of incorporation, by-laws or other constituent documents of such Subsidiary or Subsidiary Investment or otherwise, or the right of such Subsidiary or Subsidiary Investment from time to
time to (w)&nbsp;declare and pay Stock Payments with respect to capital stock owned by Barnes from time to time owed to Barnes or any of its Subsidiaries, or (y)&nbsp;make loans or advances to Barnes or any of its Subsidiaries, or (z)&nbsp;transfer
any of its properties or assets to Barnes or any of its Subsidiaries; <U>provided</U>, <U>however</U>, that such restriction may be permitted with respect to any Subsidiary or Subsidiary Investment in which Barnes or a Subsidiary directly or
indirectly owns less than 80% of the Voting Stock and in which Barnes&#146; or such Subsidiary&#146;s cumulative investment since the Closing Date (in terms of cash invested in and/or assets contributed to the entity) (i)&nbsp;individually is less
than 10% of the book value of the assets of Barnes and its </FONT>
</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">10 </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%">
<FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">consolidated Subsidiaries, and (ii)&nbsp;when taken together with all such Subsidiaries and Subsidiary Investments subject to any such restrictions in which
Barnes or a Subsidiary directly or indirectly owns less than 80% of the Voting Stock, is less than 15% of the book value of the assets of Barnes and its consolidated Subsidiaries.&#148; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(iii) <B>Amendments to Section&nbsp;8.</B> </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(1) Sections 8.1(a), (b), (c), (d), (e), (g)&nbsp;and (h)&nbsp;of the Existing Note Purchase Agreement are
hereby amended by (i)&nbsp;deleting all references to &#147;the Guarantor&#148; and the words &#147;or the Guarantor&#148;, as applicable, and substituting &#147;Barnes&#148; in lieu thereof and (ii)&nbsp;deleting all references to &#147;the
Company&#148; in such Sections in their entirety. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">(2) Section&nbsp;8.1(f) of the Existing Note Purchase Agreement is hereby amended by deleting all references to &#147;the Company&#148; and substituting &#147;Barnes&#148; in lieu thereof. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(3) Section&nbsp;8.2 of the Existing Note Purchase Agreement
is hereby amended by (i)&nbsp;deleting all references to &#147;the Company&#148; in such Section and substituting &#147;Barnes&#148; in lieu thereof and (ii)&nbsp;deleting the all references the &#147;the Guarantor&#148; and the words &#147;the
Guarantor and&#148;, as applicable, in their entirety. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"
SIZE="2">(4) Section&nbsp;8.4 of the Existing Note Purchase Agreement is hereby amended by (i)&nbsp;deleting in the first line of such Section the words &#147;The Guarantor and the Company each&#148; and substituting &#147;Barnes&#148; in lieu
thereof, (ii)&nbsp;deleting all remaining references to &#147;the Guarantor&#148; in such Section and substituting &#147;Barnes&#148; in lieu thereof (ii)&nbsp;deleting the words &#147;and the Company each&#148; from such Section and all remaining
references to &#147;the Company&#148; in their entirety. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(iv) <B>Amendments to Section 9.</B> </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT
FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(1) Sections 9.1(a) through (j), inclusive of the Existing Note Purchase Agreement are hereby amended by (i)&nbsp;deleting in the words &#147;the Company&#148;, &#147;the Company or&#148; and &#147;or the
Company&#148; in their entirety and (ii)&nbsp;deleting all references to &#147;the Guarantor&#148; in such Sections and substituting &#147;Barnes&#148; in lieu thereof. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT
SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(2) The caption and text of Sections 9.1(l) and (m)&nbsp;of the Existing Note Purchase Agreement are hereby
deleted and there is substituted therefor &#147;Intentionally Omitted&#148;. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">11 </FONT></P>


<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" COLOR="#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(3) Section&nbsp;9.2 of the Existing Note Purchase Agreement is hereby amended by
(i)&nbsp;deleting all references to &#147;the Guarantor&#148; in their entirety and (ii)&nbsp;deleting all references to &#147;the Company&#148; or &#147;The Company&#148;, as applicable, in their entirety and substituting &#147;Barnes&#148; in lieu
thereof. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(v) <B>Amendments to
Section&nbsp;10.</B> </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(1) The following
definitions appearing in Section&nbsp;10 to the Existing Note Purchase Agreement are hereby amended and restated in their entirety to read as follows: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Business Day</U> - any day other than a Saturday, Sunday or a U.S. national, Connecticut or New York holiday. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#147;<U>Notes</U> shall mean the Amended 7.66% Notes and
the Amended 7.80% Notes.&#148; </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(2) The
definitions of &#147;Change of Control&#148;, &#147;Consolidated Assets&#148;, &#147;Consolidated Net Worth&#148;, &#147;Related Person&#148;, and &#147;Senior Management&#148; appearing in Section&nbsp;10 to the Existing Note Purchase Agreement are
hereby amended by deleting all references to &#147;the Guarantor&#148; or &#147;the Company&#148;, as applicable, and substituting &#147;Barnes&#148; in lieu thereof. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT

in their appropriate alphabetical order: </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:8%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"

specified in Section&nbsp;3 hereof to be fulfilled on or before the Effective Date have not been fulfilled, the 1999 Noteholders shall, at their election, be relieved of all further obligations under this Assumption Agreement, without thereby
waiving any rights the 1999 Noteholders may have by reason of such failure or such nonfulfillment, and the Existing Note Purchase Agreement and the Existing Notes shall remain in full force and effect and the Consent, the Assumption, the Release and
the Amendments and Restatements shall be of no force or effect. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman"

STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">To induce the Noteholders to enter into this Assumption Agreement, Barnes warrants and represents to the Noteholders that, as of the Effective Date:
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>2.1. Organization; Power and Authority. </B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Each of Barnes and 3031786 is a corporation duly organized, validly existing
and in good standing under the laws of its jurisdiction of incorporation, and is duly qualified as a foreign corporation and is in good standing in each jurisdiction in which such qualification is required by law, other than those jurisdictions as
to which the failure to be so qualified or in good standing could not, individually or in the aggregate, reasonably be expected to have a Material Adverse Effect. Barnes has the corporate power and authority to own or hold under lease the properties
it purports to own or hold under lease, to transact the business it transacts and proposes to transact, to execute and deliver this Assumption Agreement and the Notes, and to perform the provisions of this Assumption Agreement, the Amended Note
Agreement and the Notes. 3031786 has the corporate power and authority to execute and deliver this Assumption Agreement and to perform the provisions thereof. Each Subsidiary of 3031786 is also a Subsidiary of Barnes. </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>2.2. Authorization, etc. </B></FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(a) This Assumption Agreement, the Amended Note Agreement
and the Notes have been duly authorized and duly executed and delivered by all necessary corporate action on the part of Barnes, and this Assumption Agreement and the Amended Note Agreement constitute, and upon execution and delivery thereof each
Note will constitute, a legal, valid and binding obligation of Barnes, enforceable against it in accordance with its terms, except as such enforceability may be limited by (a)&nbsp;applicable bankruptcy, insolvency, reorganization, moratorium or
other similar laws affecting the enforcement of creditors&#146; rights generally and (b)&nbsp;general principles of equity (regardless of whether such enforceability is considered in a proceeding in equity or at law). </FONT></P> <P
STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:-6px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:4%; text-indent:4%"><FONT FACE="Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(b) This Assumption Agreement has been duly authorized and
duly executed and delivered by all necessary corporate action on the part of 3031786, and this Assumption Agreement constitutes a legal, valid and binding obligation of 3031786, enforceable against it in accordance with its terms, except as such
enforceability may be limited by (a)&nbsp;applicable bankruptcy, insolvency, reorganization, moratorium or other similar laws affecting the enforcement of creditors&#146; rights generally and (b)&nbsp;general principles of equity (regardless of
whether such enforceability is considered in a proceeding in equity or at law). </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
